Normal Null Distribution

```{r}
    null_dist <- c()

    for(i in 1:10000) {
    sample_1 <- rnorm(10,0,1)
    sample_2 <- rnorm(10,0,1)
    null_dist <- c(null_dist,mean(sample_2)-mean(sample_1))
    }
```

```{r}
    y <- hist(null_dist, freq = FALSE)
    y$density
    i <- which(y$density < 0.05)
    i
    y$breaks[i[5]]
    
```

T-Distribution

```{r}
    1 - pt(c(.5,1,1.5,2,2.5), 9)

```

```{r}
    t_dist <- c()

    for(i in 1:10000) {
      sample_3 <- rnorm(10,0,1)
      t_dist <- c(t_dist,(mean(sample_3)- 0)/(sd(sample_3)/(sqrt(length(sample_3)))))
    }
    hist(t_dist)
    
```
